cards.title: Alexandria
powers: You may play a card. Return one of your noncharacter cards in play to your hand

openingLines.default: When I say I'll do something, I make it happen

incapacitatedAbilities: Select a target. Until the start of your next turn reduce damage dealt to that target by 1
One player may search their deck for a card and put it into their hand
{AlexandriaCharacter} deals 2 melee damage to a target

cards.title: Protector
body: When this card enters play {AlexandriaCharacter} regains 2 HP
At the end of your turn select a target. Until the start of your next turn, whenever that target would be dealt damage, redirect that damage to {AlexandriaCharacter}
cards.flavorText: She flew forward, trying to draw{BR}his attention, interjecting herself{BR}between the Behemoth and the others.

cards.title: Named After the Library
body: When this card enters play shuffle your trash into your deck
Whenever you would draw a card instead reveal the top 2 cards of your deck, put 1 into your hand, and return the other to the top of your deck

flavorQuotes.text: A reference to the burned{BR}library of Alexandria. It's been mythologized{BR}as that era's sum of human knowledge.{BR}I am much the same.

cards.title: Cold Reading
body: When this card enters play reveal the top 3 cards of the villain deck. Put them back in any order
At the start of your turn reveal the top card of the villain deck. Either discard it or return it to the top of the villain deck

flavorQuotes.text: Mm hmm, I know you've{BR}probably got someone in the lobby or outside, receiving coded messages.

cards.title: Invincible
body: From when this card enters play until the start of your next turn, when {AlexandriaCharacter} would be dalt damage you may discard a card. If you do, prevent the damage.
Reduce damage dealt to {AlexandriaCharacter} by 1
cards.flavorText: His flame burned through her,{BR}the sand was turning to glass around{BR}her, burning her costume,{BR}but it didn't burn her.

cards.title: Supersonic Flight
body: When this card enters play {AlexandriaCharacter} may deal 2 sonic damage to a target
When {AlexandriaCharacter} deals damage to a villain target you may destroy a noncharacter Device or Ongoing card

flavorQuotes.text: She's as strong as{BR}any parahuman we've recorded.{BR}Flies at speeds that match your own, Legend.

cards.title: Martial Arts
body: When this card enters play you may destroy a non-character-card target with 5 or less HP
When {AlexandriaCharacter} destroys a target select a target. Until the start of your next turn that target cannot deal damage

flavorQuotes.text: I know martial arts and I remember everything that crosses my path.

cards.title: Imperious Demeanour
body: When this card enters play draw a card
Whenever you use a power {AlexandriaCharacter} regains 3 HP

flavorQuotes.text: They tried to drown me.{BR}It didn't work.{BR}Others have tried the same thing,{BR}in many different variations.

cards.title: Alexandria's Cape
powers: {AlexandriaCharacter} deals 3 melee damage to a target. Return one of your noncharacter cards in play to your hand
cards.flavorText: Alexandria was something else.{BR}The heroic equivalent of a cruise missile.

cards.title: Prosthetic Eye
body: At the end of your turn reveal the top 3 cards of a deck. Put them back in any order
cards.flavorText: Eidolon's healing had only been able{BR}to do so much.{BR}She held a glass eye in one hand,{BR}the remains of her other eye in the other.

cards.title: Time-Locked
body: Note down Alexandria's current HP
At the start of your next turn, if {AlexandriaCharacter} is not incapacitated, set {AlexandriaCharacter}'s HP to the value you noted down

flavorQuotes.text: Her body's peculiar.{BR}Doesn't really age. Hair doesn't grow,{BR}nails don't grow.{BR}Wounds don't really heal or get worse.

cards.title: Pure Strength
body: {AlexandriaCharacter} deals a target 4 projectile damage

flavorQuotes.text: Do you get a lot of blood{BR}on your costume?

cards.title: I Know Them
body: {AlexandriaCharacter} deals 5 melee damage to the villain target with the highest HP

flavorQuotes.text: There have been fifty-six Endbringer{BR}attacks in the last nineteen years.{BR}I have personally participated in forty-nine of them

cards.title: ...And They Know Me
body: The villain target with the highest HP deals {AlexandriaCharacter} 5 psychic damage
The villain target with the highest HP cannot deal damage until the start of your next turn

flavorQuotes.text: The creatures know me.{BR}They know how to fight me,{BR}and I know how to fight them.{BR}Yet I'm still here.
